growthexperiments-mentor-dashboard-disab: Mentor dashboard is not enabled at this wiki.
growthexperiments-mentor-dashboard-must-: To enable mentor dashboard, {{GENDER:|you}} first need to [[$1|enroll as a mentor]].
growthexperiments-mentor-dashboard-misco: Before mentor dashboard can be used, mentor list first needs to be configured. An administrator can use [[Special:EditGrowthConfig]] for that purpose.
growthexperiments-mentor-dashboard-mente: See {{GENDER:|your}} mentees below. Use the filters to change which mentees are shown.
The table requires JavaScript. Please enable JavaScript to be able to use this module.
More information about who is in {{GENDER:|your}} table

This table shows {{GENDER:|your}} mentees whose account was created within the past two weeks or who have edited in the last six months, and have the [https://mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Growth/Feature_summary#NH newcomer homepage enabled]. Data is updated every three hours.
Filter to mentees active in the last $2 {{PLURAL:$1|day|days}}
Filter to mentees active in the last $2 {{PLURAL:$1|month|months}}

The mentor dashboard only shows recently active mentees. More information can be displayed via the info icon. If {{GENDER:|you}} recently enrolled into mentorship, {{GENDER:|you}} might have no mentees assigned yet.
Change your filters to find mentees.
{{GENDER:|You}} can view the edits made by all {{GENDER:|your}} mentees by visiting this [$1 filtered view of Recent Changes].
growthexperiments-mentor-dashboard-mento: If {{GENDER:|you}} wish to quit mentoring permanently, you can do so via Special:QuitMentorship. Clicking "OK" will redirect you there.
Since you are away until the $1, your mentees will be temporarily reassigned to a different mentor.

{{GENDER:|You}} are currently blocked. {{GENDER:|Your}} status is temporarily set to "away" and {{GENDER:|your}} mentees are temporarily reassigned to a different mentor. If {{GENDER:|you}} are unblocked (or the block expires), then {{GENDER:|your}} status will be set to "Active" and {{GENDER:|your}} mentees will be reassigned to {{GENDER:|you}}.
{{GENDER:|You}} are currently blocked. You cannot change {{GENDER:|your}} mentor status while blocked.
$1 {{GENDER:$1|is}} currently locked. {{GENDER:$1|Their}} mentor status cannot be modified while locked.

If {{GENDER:|you}} cannot mentor for a specific time period (more than 1 week) {{GENDER:|you}} can set {{GENDER:|yourself}} as away. During that period another mentor will receive questions from {{GENDER:|your}} mentees.
Input in "{{GENDER:|You'll}} be gone for" is not an integer. Please try again.
Input in "{{GENDER:|You'll}} be gone for" is too high. The maximum number of days a mentor can be away for is 365 (one year).
Unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
You can change a mentee’s mentor to yourself. This is frequently used for editing events so that instructors can be a newcomer’s mentor both on and off wiki.
growthexperiments-rcfilters-mentorship-s: Mentees assigned to {{GENDER:|you}} whom {{GENDER:|you}} have starred on {{GENDER:|your}} mentor dashboard
growthexperiments-quit-mentorship-listed: It's sad to see you go. To start the process of quitting from mentorship, you first need to remove your name [[$1|from the list of mentors]]. Once you do so, please return to this page.
growthexperiments-quit-mentorship-not-li: Next step in quitting mentorship is to reassign your mentees. If you are sure you want to quit, please press the button below.
growthexperiments-quit-mentorship-has-me: It's sad to see {{GENDER:|you}} go. To quit from mentorship, {{GENDER:|you}} need to fill out the form below. Once you submit it, all your mentees will be reassigned to a different mentor. This cannot be reversed. If {{GENDER:|you}} need a break from mentorship, instead consider updating your status to Away or reduce the number of mentees assigned to you. {{GENDER:|You}} can make these changes from {{GENDER:|your}} [[Special:MentorDashboard|Mentor dashboard settings]].
growthexperiments-quit-mentorship-succes: Your mentees will be reassigned to other mentors shortly.
echo-pref-tooltip-ge-mentorship: Notifications related to mentorship features maintained by the Growth team. This notification lets you know that you were claimed as a mentee, or that one of your mentees was claimed by someone else.
growthexperiments-mentor-dashboard-mento: Number of mentees assigned to me
Unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
Mentees are assigned randomly to mentors as their accounts are created.  You can manage how many mentees are assigned to you, but some mentees may ask questions more frequently than others
It’s recommended to start on the “Average” setting to gauge your support capacity before increasing or decreasing.
growthexperiments-mentor-list-datatype-m: $1 is expected to be $2, but is $3
growthexperiments-mentor-list-unexpected: Mentor definition contains an unexpected key $1
growthexperiments-mentor-writer-error-al: Mentor $1 was already added to the mentor list
growthexperiments-mentor-writer-error-no: Mentor $1 is not in the mentor list
growthexperiments-mentor-writer-error-an: Mentor $1 is not a registered user
growthexperiments-mentor-writer-error-me: Introduction message is too long (affected user ID: $2). Maximum length is $1.
growthexperiments-manage-mentors-pretext: This page shows a list of mentors.
{{GENDER:|You}} can remove mentors that violate community standards or policies or edit their mentorship-related options.
Administrators can remove mentors that violate community standards or policies. They can also edit their mentorship-related options, such as their introduction message.
The list of mentors is stored in [[$1|MediaWiki namespace]], including history.
To enroll as a mentor, go to [[Special:EnrollAsMentor]].
growthexperiments-manage-mentors-error-n: Error: No such user with ID of $1 exists. This is probably an internal error.
growthexperiments-manage-mentors-auto-as: New accounts are randomly assigned to these mentors.
growthexperiments-manage-mentors-manuall: New accounts are not randomly assigned to these mentors. Like other mentors, these mentors can manually select the accounts they would like to mentor. This section is mainly for workshop hosts who just want to mentor people they met.
growthexperiments-manage-mentors-edit-pr: {{GENDER:|You}} are about to edit the mentorship-related options for {{GENDER:$1|mentor}} [[User:$1|$1]].
growthexperiments-manage-mentors-edit-is: Mentor "$1" is currently blocked, and their away status cannot be changed.
growthexperiments-manage-mentors-remove-: {{GENDER:|You}} are about to remove [[User:$1|$1]] as a {{GENDER:$1|mentor}}.
growthexperiments-manage-mentors-return-: You can [[Special:ManageMentors|return back]] to the list of mentors.
growthexperiments-mentorship-enrollasmen: Thank {{GENDER:|you}} for volunteering as a {{SITENAME}} {{GENDER:|mentor}}. {{GENDER:|You}} can enroll as a mentor by filling out this form.
Introduction message introduces {{GENDER:|you}} as a mentor. Please keep this shorter than 240 characters. No wikitext is allowed.
{{GENDER:|You}} are now enrolled as a mentor. {{GENDER:|You}} can continue to [[Special:MentorDashboard|the mentor dashboard]] now.
Only users with at least $1 {{PLURAL:$1|edit|edits}} and $2 {{PLURAL:$2|day|days}} of presence can enroll as mentors.
tag-mentor list change-description: Tag applied to edits made to the structured mentor list via GrowthExperiments
